column1: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
column2: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
column5: This programme is specifically designed to provide:Advanced skills and techniques in artificial intelligence.Research opportunities to solve meaningful industrial problems with artificial intelligence techniques.Advanced research opportunities in artificial intelligence in preparation for doctoral studies.Upon completion of the MSc in Artificial Intelligence & MSc in Data Science & Business Analytics programme, in addition to their Masters Degrees, students will receive a professional certificate from TIBCO Software Inc. TIBCO is amongst the global leaders in Integration, Data Management and Analytics platforms that has a global clientele. In addition to the certification, TIBCO, as APU's industry partner, has provided all students & lecturers with complimentary access to the TIBCO Spotfire software for academic purposes. Students are utilizing the software to perform tasks & projects related to data analytics.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full Time (1+ years) Part Time (2-3 years)
